snippet.title: The Age of Hell Realms Deep Trailer 2021 - Demo out
snippet.description:
The very first official trailer for The Age of Hell as shown at Realms Deep 2021

Get the demo here! https://hellforge-studios.itch.io/the-age-of-hell

Support The Age of Hell on Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/TheAgeofHell

Join The Hellforge to talk level design, share your work, follow my project The Age of Hell or just hang out
Discord: https://discord.gg/hellforge​

Follow me on twitch to watch mapping streams and a bit of variety gaming
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bridgeburner56​

Follow me on twitter for sexy screenshots and other news
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bridgeburner4



#RD2021 #AgeofHell #indiegame
